update format_supplier set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enterprise_name = #{enterpriseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stype = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, principal = #{principal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, organ = #{organ,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, number = #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, license = #{license,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supplier_size = #{supplierSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, person = #{person,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start = #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end = #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, document = #{document,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator = #{operator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_ip = #{operatorIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operator_time = #{operatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM format_supplier where enterprise_id=#{eid}
and stype = #{search.stype} and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') and number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.number},'%') and address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.address},'%')

SELECT count(1) FROM format_supplier where 1=1
and stype = #{search.stype} and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') and number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.number},'%') and address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.address},'%')

SELECT FROM format_supplier where 1=1
and stype = #{search.stype} and name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.name},'%') and number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.number},'%') and address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search.address},'%') order by id desc limit #{page.offset}, #{page.pageSize}
